attributes.action: Judicial Taskforce to investigate and charge all involved in Rape Gangs cover up
attributes.additional_details: this includes those yet to be charged for their involvement in the rapes of these young girls but also those individuals from the police, councils, social services, government departments and MPs that were complicate in the cover up. As nobody is above the law including the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: I believe that the historical cover up of the Rape Gangs in the United Kingdom by predominantly men of Pakistan Muslim heritage needs a Judicial Taskforce set up in order to bring to justice all those involved in the cover up

rejection.details:
There is currently a Grooming Gangs Taskforce in operation. Established in April 2023, this police taskforce collaborates with all 43 police forces in England and Wales to combat child sexual exploitation and grooming gangs.
 
More information: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/grooming-gangs-taskforce-arrests-hundreds-in-first-year
